page.title: 01BOLDRE PARISH S.E.
page.content: The block contains 2 villages,Pilley and S.Baddesley,2 hamlets,Portmore and Norley Wood,several farms,1 river,3 ponds, a few streams,commonland, heathland,woods,a church,2 chapels,4 schools,1 Post Office,tumuli,2 private parks and a small corner of a housing estate.There is no industry (by a hairsbreadth) but in this decade at least we have a fairly high employment level in nearby towns and factories. Market gardening, farming,and forestry work is also available and there is a large but active retired population. There are 2 state Primary schools and 2 private schools which all enjoy a high reputation.Modern amenities are few but there is a Post Office,a general shop,a pub,2 village halls and good access roads and finally,miles of beautiful open forest land.
